tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_date DATE,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    breach_type VARCHAR(50),
    affected_records INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
  breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_date DATE,
  breached_company TEXT,
  breach_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mitigation_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_id INT REFERENCES security_breaches(breach_id),
  mitigation_strategy TEXT,
  mitigation_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    breach_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    breach_date DATE,
    breach_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_records_lost INTEGER,
    breach_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE breach_locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_id INT,
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE breach_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_id INT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(20),
    mitigation_strategy TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_date DATE,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    breach_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_records_lost INT
);
